source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_SEQ_00<tab>Orn Khai would like to discuss events which may or may not be pertinent to your search.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_SEQ_00<tab>望海楼のオーン・カイは、冒険者に伝えたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_SEQ_01<tab>Orn Khai seems to be enjoying his new surroundings, remarking that the locals treat Dravanians with much more respect when compared to Ishgardians. He also notes that he has made several new acquaintances of late thanks to Karaku. In fact, Orn Khai was just about to set off to meet one such friend when you arrived. Apparently said acquaintance knows something that might aid your search. You decide to accompany Orn Khai and find out what this individual has to say.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_SEQ_01<tab>オーン・カイによると、クガネでできた友だちが、すんごい情報を持っているという。友だちと会うため、クガネの楽座街に向かった「オーン・カイ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_SEQ_02<tab>Orn Khai's friend is revealed to be Gyodo─a Namazu moneylender. He suggests that you travel to Reunion on the Azim Steppe, for an area nearby is said to be home to a slumbering dragon with scales as dark as the night sky. Orn Khai, convinced you may have finally found Faunehm, sets off for the Steppe and bids you follow him as soon as possible.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_SEQ_02<tab>オーン・カイと話した。クガネでできた友だちことギョドウによると、アジムステップに「漆黒の巨竜」という存在がいるらしい。アジムステップの再会の市に向かい、「オーン・カイ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_SEQ_03<tab>You find Orn Khai in Reunion surrounded by Auri children whose curiosity has been piqued by the petite dragon. His hands more than full, Orn Khai encourages you to ask the adult members of the local community about the dragon you seek. You look upon the settlement and wonder whom to engage in conversation first.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_SEQ_03<tab>オーン・カイと話した。手分けして、現地の部族から「漆黒の巨竜」の情報を集めることになった。再会の市の人々から情報を集めよう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_SEQ_04<tab>It soon becomes apparent that the people of Reunion are not much for small talk. One tells you in no uncertain terms to leave him be if you are not of mind to trade, and another refuses to talk at all. However, the Spinner smiles upon you eventually, as you hear that the dragon is said to dwell near the mountains north of Reunion.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_SEQ_04<tab>情報を集めたところ、「漆黒の巨竜」は北の山岳部をねぐらにしているようだ。再会の市の「オーン・カイ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_SEQ_05<tab>You return to Orn Khai to find him somewhat overwhelmed by all the children's affection. After sharing your findings with him, he agrees the two of you would be best served by searching around the nearby mountains. Once he has freed himself of his admirers, you both prepare to head to Ceol Aen to the northwest.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_SEQ_05<tab>オーン・カイに報告した。「漆黒の巨竜」を探すため、アジムステップのキオルエンに向かい、「オーン・カイ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_SEQ_06<tab>While searching for Faunehm, you encounter an Oroniri warrior who states that the dark-scaled dragon has thrashed eight of his tribe's finest warriors. You soon find the creature and it is immediately apparent that this is the dragon you have been searching for. Orn Khai calls out to Faunehm, but she is in a frenzy of rage, and words do not reach her.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_SEQ_06<tab>オーン・カイと話した。「漆黒の巨竜」は、探し続けていた番いの竜、ファウネムだった。だが、冒険者たちは理性を失っていたファウネムに襲われてしまう。冒険者は応戦し、ファウネムをひるませた。アジムステップのオーン・カイと話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_SEQ_07<tab>Following the young dragon's advice, you choose to withdraw from the battle, in order to formulate a more effective plan of action.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_SEQ_07<tab>オーン・カイは、冒険者とファウネムの戦いが、どちらかが倒れるまで続くと判断し、ひとまず撤退することにした。キオルエンの「オーン・カイ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_SEQ_08<tab>Orn Khai is clearly distressed by the state in which he found his father's consort. He bids you leave him alone for a while, to allow him to clear his head and consider how you may free Faunehm from her fury. You begin the walk back to Reunion as Orn Khai takes to the skies once more.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_SEQ_08<tab>ようやく見つけたファウネムが、理性を失っていたことで、オーン・カイも動揺しているようだ。再会の市で「オーン・カイ」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_SEQ_09You find a slightly calmer Orn Khai upon returning to Reunion. He notes that the key to getting through to Faunehm is identifying the cause of her temper, and asks that you allow him some time to contemplate what could be ailing her.

※The next dragoon quest will be available from Orn Khai upon reaching level 70.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_SEQ_09オーン・カイと話した。冷静さを取り戻したオーン・カイは、ファウネムを元に戻すために、暴走の原因を探るつもりだという。暴走原因の特定を待とう。

※竜騎士のレベルが70以上になると、再会の市のオーン・カイから次の竜騎士クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Orn Khai.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_TODO_00<tab>オーン・カイと話す

target: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_TODO_01<tab>再会の市のオーン・カイと話す

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_TODO_02<tab>Gather information in Reunion.

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_TODO_03<tab>Report to Orn Khai.

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_010<tab>Hello there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I must say, I could get used to life in the Far East. Unlike those in Ishgard, Hingans harbor no ill feelings towards us Dravanians.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_010)) (( )) 02 /var>、元気にしてる？
いやぁ、東方のヒトって、イシュガルドにいるヒトと違って、
ドラゴン族に抵抗が少ないのがいいよねぇ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_011<tab>You should really hear some of the things Karaku says; he keeps remarking that he wants me to stay here for eternity when he introduces me to new people. It seems he believes quite strongly that dragons bring good luck.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_011望海楼のご主人なんて、竜がいると縁起がいいって喜んで、
ずっとここに棲んでてほしいなんて言ってるくらいさ。
そんなわけで、何人も友だちができたよ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_012<tab>But what is that expression I see on your face? Could it be jealousy? Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, do not worry yourself. You shall be just as popular here one day!
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_012…………ち、ちょっと睨まないでよ。
ちゃんと竜の伝承についても、調べてたんだから！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_013<tab>More importantly, one of the new friends I have made through Karaku mentioned that he knew something that might prove relevant to our search. I was just about to go and meet him now; why don't you accompany me?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_013友だちのひとりが、
すんごい情報を持ってるらしいから、これから会いに行くんだ！
)) (( )) 02 /var>もいっしょに行こうよ！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_020<tab>Give me a moment, I shall call him now!
target: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_020<tab>ちょっと待ってて、友だちを呼ぶからさ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_021<tab>It is I, Orn Khai!
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_021おーい、僕だよ！
オーン・カイだよぉ～！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_GYODO_000_022<tab>Endless and most sincere apologies to you and yours for the wait, yes, yes. What, what? <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Do not worry, no more betrayals, sworn on all the kami in creation I have, yes, yes.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_GYODO_000_022お待たせしたっぺな。
って、なんでがここに！？
こ、今回は騙したりしないから、落ち着いてほしいっぺよ！！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_023<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you have already made Gyodo's acquaintance?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_023あれれ、)) (( )) 02 /var>って、
ギョドウと知り合いだったの？

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_GYODO_000_024<tab>Endless and most sincere apologies to you and yours for the wait, yes, yes.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_GYODO_000_024<tab>お待たせしたっぺな。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_025<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, allow me to introduce Gyodo. Do not be alarmed by his rather slimy appearance for he is perfectly harmless.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_025)) (( )) 02 /var>、このヌメヌメしてるのが、
僕の友だち、ギョドウだよ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_GYODO_000_026<tab>Come to hear about dragon legends, yes, yes?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_GYODO_000_026……ツレがいるとは思わなかっぺけど、
とにかく、竜の伝承について聞きに来たっぺな？

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_GYODO_000_027<tab>There is a place that comes to mind. The Azim Steppe.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_GYODO_000_027それなら、ひとつ思い当たることがあるっぺよ。
オレらナマズオの故郷は、オサード小大陸を流れる大河……
「無二江」ってところっぺな。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_GYODO_000_028<tab>You can get there by following the One River: home to all Namazu.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_GYODO_000_028その河を上流へ上流へと遡っていくと、
アジムステップという大草原に行き着くっぺよ……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_GYODO_000_029<tab>Go way, way upstream and you will reach the Steppe, yes, yes. It is here that a monstrous dragon as dark as the night sky is said to slumber.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_GYODO_000_029この大草原の北にある山々が、
無二江の水源地になっているわけっぺども……
その山には、恐ろしい「漆黒の巨竜」が眠ってるらしいっぺよ！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_030<tab>D-Dark as the night sky, you say?
target: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_030<tab>し、し、漆黒の巨竜だって！？

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_GYODO_000_031<tab>No more information do I have. Go to the marketplace on the Azim Steppe known as Reunion. You may find the answers you seek there.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_GYODO_000_031アジムステップには、
大勢のヒトが集まる「再会の市」という場所があるらしいっぺよ。
詳しいことは、そこで現地の部族から聞くといいっぺな。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_032<tab>This could be the one, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The Horde was home to many a dark-scaled dragon after all; let us hurry to Reunion!
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_032邪竜の眷属には、黒い鱗の竜も多いし、
なんだか、それっぽくなってきた気がするぞ！
)) (( )) 02 /var>、さっそく「再会の市」に行こう！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_040<tab>Well, as these energetic children have come to me, it feels only natural that I try questioning them first.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_040なんだか、いきなり取り囲まれたんだけど……
とにかくこのヒトの子どもたちから話を聞いてみるよ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_041<tab>Perhaps your time would be best spent asking some of the more mature Au Ra if they know anything of the dragon Gyodo mentioned.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_041)) (( )) 02 /var>は、市場にいる大人たちから、
「漆黒の巨竜」について情報を集めてきて。
終わったら、また声をかけてね。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_045<tab>Now, now, little ones. There is plenty of me to go around.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_045<tab>あぁ、もう触らないでって！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_QESTIRMERCHANT_000_050<tab>...
target: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_QESTIRMERCHANT_000_050<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORONIRMAN_000_055<tab>Come to trade livestock? No!? Then piss off.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORONIRMAN_000_055なんだ、家畜の取引はしないのか？
そうでないなら、声をかけるな！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_DOTHARLWOMAN_000_060<tab>Woolen rugs! Fine woolen rugs! Bring some warmth to your home!
target: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_DOTHARLWOMAN_000_060<tab>さて、値段はっと……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_QESTIRMERCHANT_000_070<tab>...
target: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_QESTIRMERCHANT_000_070<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_SYSTEM_000_071<tab>It seems you would be better served asking elsewhere.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_SYSTEM_000_071<tab>どうやら、何も知らないようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORONIRMAN_000_072<tab>A black dragon in these parts? Sure I know of it. The storytellers say the fiend awakens once every few decades and goes on a wild rampage. When it's had its fill of destruction, it returns to its lair in the northwestern mountains and slumbers.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORONIRMAN_000_072「漆黒の巨竜」の話が聞きたいだぁ？
数十年から百年おきくらいに、目覚めては暴れ回るって話だな。
語り部によれば、北の山岳部をねぐらにしているらしい。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORONIRMAN_000_073<tab>If any tribe were able to slay such a beast, it would bring them great honor. We Oronir have had our eyes on it for some time.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORONIRMAN_000_073伝説として語り継がれるほどの存在だから、
狩ることができれば、一族の名誉となることだろう。
我らオロニル族の戦士たちも、狙っているようだぞ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_DOTHARLWOMAN_000_074<tab>You are looking for the dragon, are you? I did hear there's been a sighting recently. First one in a hundred years apparently.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_DOTHARLWOMAN_000_074アンタも「漆黒の巨竜」の噂を聞いたのかい？
なんでも、最近になって、また目撃者が出たそうじゃないか。
かれこれ百年ぶりくらいかねぇ……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_DOTHARLWOMAN_000_075<tab>Not that I believe any of that nonsense! It would not surprise me if the whole story was dreamed up by some fool Oronir in his cups.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_DOTHARLWOMAN_000_075もっともアタシは、巨竜なんて信じちゃいないけどね。
大方、酔っ払ったオロニル族の男が、夢でも見たんだろうさ。

source:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_080)) (( )) 02 /var>...help... These children are not playing nice.
I do not suppose you have fared any better?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_080)) (( )) 02 /var>……助けてよ。
この子どもたち、ぜんぜん話を聞いてくれないんだ。
そっちは、何か情報をつかめた？

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_081<tab>And it's said to live in the northwest?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_081フンフン、なーるほど……。
北の山岳部に棲む、黒くて巨大な竜で、
数十年から百年おきくらいに目覚めるのか……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_082<tab>If the dragon has truly been sighted recently, our timing is perfect! I am glad we did not come this far only to find it in the midst of a deep slumber.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_082ますますドラゴン族っぽいね。
しかも、最近になって目撃者が出たってことは、
休眠期を抜けだして、活動期に入りはじめたのかもしれないよ。

source:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_083Let us head for the mountains to the northwest!
Now, now, children. Do you not think it is time you were making your way back to mummy and daddy? We grown-ups have business to attend to!
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_083よーし、それじゃあ、北西の山のふもとに行ってみよう！
ほらほら、お子様たちは、親のところに帰りな！
僕たち大人は忙しいんだから！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_090<tab>This seems as good an area as any to commence our search. Ready to get started, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_090このあたりから、ファウネムさん探しを始めよう。
)) (( )) 02 /var>、準備はいい？

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_091<tab>Well then, let us see if we cannot─wait, what is that smell?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_091さてと、ここから山の方に向かって探していくよ。
…………んっ、何だかヒトの臭いが……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_092<tab>Are we about to learn that the locals refer to this warrior as a “black dragon”?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_092いやな予感がしてきたよ……。
まさか、あの黒い鱗のヒトが「漆黒の巨竜」なわけないよね？

source:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORONIRWARRIOR_000_093
Are you also on the hunt for this dragon?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORONIRWARRIOR_000_093はぁ、はぁ、はぁ……。
お前たちも「漆黒の巨竜」狩りに挑むつもりか？

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_094<tab>Hunt!? Perish the thought! We have come to speak with it.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_094狩るだって？
違うよ、僕たちは話をしに来たんだ！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORONIRWARRIOR_000_095<tab>Now I've heard everything... Speak, you say? <var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> may be calm and willing to talk, but I assure you that black-scaled monster is not in the mood.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORONIRWARRIOR_000_095むおっ……しゃべる竜だと！？
いやいや、この小さい竜はともかくとして、
あの化け物と話などできるものか！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORONIRWARRIOR_000_096<tab>It has thrashed eight of our finest warriors. We are disgraced, but I must inform our khan of the battle's outcome.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORONIRWARRIOR_000_096屈強なオロニル族の戦士を集めて、
8人がかりで挑んだが、あっという間にやられてしまったのだぞ！
屈辱ではあるが……ここは退いて、族長に報告せねば……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_097<tab>Well, he certainly was not interested in staying here any longer. Come along, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I think we may have finally found Faunehm this time!
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_097あぁ、もう行っちゃった……。
)) (( )) 02 /var>、とにかく先に進もう。
今度は本当に、ファウネムさんだと思うんだ！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_098<tab>Agh! Faunehm, I beg of you, listen to me!
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_098痛たたた……
ファウネムさん！
お願いだから、僕の話を聞いてよ！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_099<tab>She's mad with fury. My voice does not reach her.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_099<tab>ダ、ダメだ……怒り狂っていて、声が届いてないよ！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_100<tab>This clash will only end if one of you perishes.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_100あんなに強いドラゴン族と渡り合えるのはスゴイけど……
このままじゃ、ファウネムさんか)) (( )) 02 /var>、
どちらかが倒れるまで戦いは終わらない！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_101<tab>Let us retreat for now and rethink our approach!
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_101)) (( )) 02 /var>、今は退こう！
どうすればいいのか考えないと……！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_110<tab>We have come so far, and overcome so many obstacles. Yet, when we finally meet Faunehm, we cannot even speak with her...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_110遠くまで旅をして、何度も空振りを続けて、
ようやくファウネムさんと会えたのに……。
どうして、こんなことになっちゃったんだ！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_111<tab>My apologies, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but pray return to Reunion without me. I need some time to take all of this in. Perhaps a spot of hunting would help clear my mind.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_111ご、ごめんよ……ちょっと動揺しちゃって。
僕、上空を飛んで頭を冷やしてくるから……
「再会の市」で、また会おう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_120<tab>Yes, I am somewhat calmer now, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, thank you for asking. The key to all of this is discovering the source of Faunehm's rage.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_120どうにか少しは冷静になれたよ。
ファウネムさんのことだけど、なんであんな状態になったのか、
そこがわからないと、対策が立てられないと思うんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_121<tab>Once we know this, we can decide our next move. Pray give me some time.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_121まずはファウネムさんが暴走した原因を突き止めないと……。
だから、僕に少しだけ時間をちょうだい！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_122<tab>I will not allow our journey to end in failure.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG680_02913_ORNKHAI_000_122)) (( )) 02 /var>は、戦いの疲れを癒しておいて。
僕は、ファウネムさんに父ちゃんの番いに戻ってほしいんだ。
ぜったいに……ぜったいに諦めないぞ！
